common.offlineMessage: You are currently offline. Some features may be limited.
common.selectSymptomsDescription: Choose from dropdown or common symptoms below
common.noSymptomsSelected: No symptoms selected yet. Please select symptoms from the left panel.
common.additionalSymptoms: Describe any additional symptoms or details not covered above...
common.personalHealthInfoDescription: Provide your personal health information for more accurate analysis
common.medicationsPlaceholder: List any medications you are currently taking...
common.mildDescription: Noticeable but doesn't interfere with daily activities
common.moderateDescription: Causes some difficulty with daily activities
common.analysisResultsDescription: Based on your symptoms, here are potential conditions and recommended actions
common.noMatchingResults: No matching results found for the selected symptoms.
common.disclaimerText: This tool provides general information only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice. If you are experiencing severe symptoms or are concerned about your health, please consult a healthcare professional immediately.

home.heroDescription: Access essential healthcare services tailored for rural needs, even when offline. Your health companion, wherever you are.

footer.ministryAddress: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India
footer.copyright: All rights reserved. A project for rural healthcare access.

downloadApp.downloadDescription: Download the AROGYA app to get offline access to all features, even without an internet connection.

sos.sosConfirmation: Are you sure you want to send an emergency alert? This will notify your emergency contacts with your current location.
sos.emergencyContactsNotified: Your emergency contacts have been notified of your situation.
sos.name: Name

offline.offlineDataSavedDescription: Essential healthcare information has been saved for offline use.
offline.offlineDataErrorDescription: There was a problem saving data for offline use. Please try again.

auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

dietPlans.dietPlansDescription: Get personalized diet recommendations based on your region, allergies, and health conditions. These plans are designed to be nutritious and use locally available ingredients.
dietPlans.browseDietPlansDescription: Filter plans based on your region and health condition
dietPlans.aiPersonalizedDietPlanDescription: Get a diet plan tailored to your specific health needs
dietPlans.dietPlanAIExplanation: Our AI system analyzes your health profile, regional preferences, and dietary restrictions to create a personalized nutrition plan optimized for your wellbeing.
dietPlans.personalizedDietPlanFormDescription: Fill out the form below to get a diet plan tailored to your specific needs.
dietPlans.pregnantNursingDescription: Check this if you are pregnant or nursing to receive appropriate dietary recommendations.
dietPlans.dietPlanCreatedDescription: Your personalized diet plan has been created.
dietPlans.personalizedDietPlanDescription: Your AI-generated diet plan based on your health profile and preferences
dietPlans.noRestrictions: No specific dietary restrictions for this plan.
dietPlans.dietPlanDisclaimer: This diet plan is a general recommendation. Consult with a healthcare professional before making significant changes to your diet.
dietPlans.consultHealthcare: Consult with a healthcare professional before following this plan.
dietPlans.tryDifferentFilters: Try selecting different region or health condition.
dietPlans.stayHydratedDesc: Drink at least 8-10 glasses of water daily. Include fluids like buttermilk, coconut water, and herbal teas in your diet.
dietPlans.eatLocalSeasonalDesc: Locally grown seasonal fruits and vegetables are more nutritious, affordable, and environmentally sustainable.
dietPlans.balancedMealsDesc: Include proteins, complex carbohydrates, healthy fats, and fiber in your meals. Fill half your plate with vegetables and fruits.
dietPlans.macronutrientsDesc: Proteins, carbohydrates, and fats are the three main macronutrients your body needs in larger quantities for energy and body functions.
dietPlans.proteinsDesc: Essential for muscle building, tissue repair, and enzyme production.
dietPlans.carbsDesc: Primary energy source for your body, especially your brain and muscles.
dietPlans.fatsDesc: Important for hormone production, cell health, and absorbing fat-soluble vitamins.
dietPlans.micronutrientsDesc: Vitamins and minerals are needed in smaller amounts but are vital for health, immunity, and preventing diseases.
dietPlans.deficienciesDesc: Iron, Vitamin D, Vitamin B12, and Calcium are commonly deficient in Indian diets.
dietPlans.foodSourcesDesc: Eat a rainbow of fruits and vegetables to ensure diverse micronutrient intake.
dietPlans.calorieBalanceDesc: Weight management is about energy balance: calories consumed vs. calories burned through metabolism and physical activity.
dietPlans.weightLossDesc: Create a moderate calorie deficit through diet and increased activity.
dietPlans.weightGainDesc: Consume more calories than you burn, focusing on nutrient-dense foods.
dietPlans.maintenanceDesc: Balance intake with expenditure to maintain current weight.
dietPlans.offlineDietPlansInfo: You're viewing cached diet plans available offline. Connect to the internet for personalized recommendations.
